sub_title: Senior Quantitative Risk Analyst at ABN AMRO
summary:
I'm a model validator at ABN-AMRO, where I apply my knowledge in statistical models matured during my experience as a researcher. I have a broad interest for economical and behavioral complex systems, and the usage of statistical methods and models for time series and spatial data, with a focus on forecast quality.
I was a postdoc at Leiden University (LIACS), where I applied data science to provide solutions for public policy. Previously I worked at the MPI-PKS in Dresden, Germany, where I completed my PhD.
